componentDescription: A visual element used to divide or group content on a user interface.

orientation.description: Specifies the orientation of the separator, either horizontal or vertical.

variant.description: Determines the visual style or type of the separator (e.g., solid, dashed).

thickness.description: Sets the thickness or width of the separator line.

color.description: Defines the color of the separator line.

spacing.description: Controls the spacing or margin around the separator.

label.description: Provides content to display within or alongside the separator, such as text or an icon.

decorative.description: Indicates whether the separator is purely decorative (true) or conveys semantic meaning (false).

views.description: Allows for custom styling of different parts of the Separator component.
